item.description:
Join us for dinner around 7:30 or later for dancing. Band starts at 9. If you haven't met any of the group before it is always good to try to come for dinner and chat, have a few laughs and get to know each other. Once the music starts it gets loud and everyone dances! Really!

PLEASE put in your reply if you are coming for dinner or not so we can try to get enough tables together if possible. The Station does not reserve tables in the lounge area.
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be in the lounge area gathering tables by around 7:30, usually try to be along the back wall...we will have signs on the tables.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Four on the Floor at Princeton Station
